attributes.action: Allow pubs to sell takeaways during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Many pubs throughout England will have beer that is going to go off during lockdown. There is no difference between takeaway food and beer. We must support every business where possible during these very hard times. During the last lockdown my local brewery sold takeaways from their pub and it was extremely well organised so that everyone was protected. Our economy is going to take a long, long time to recover so we must support wherever we can and save jobs aswell as small businesses.
attributes.background: I would like the government to allow pubs to sell off their beer as takeaways.

rejection.details: The new regulations that have been put in place for the current lockdown allow licensed premises to sell alcohol provided this is pre-ordered by the customer: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/uksi/2020/1200/pdfs/uksi_20201200_en.pdf
